admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF036409-CHINA - ANHIU PROVINCIAL HIGHWAY,TF035711-CHINA - ANHUI PROVINCIAL
            HIGHWAY PROJECT,TF035710-CHINA - ANHUI PROVINCIAL
            HIGHWAY PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Anhui Provincial
            Highway Project is the expansion of highway capacity, which
            will alleviate traffic and enhance socioeconomic growth. The
            main components of the project are: 1) the construction of
            the expressway connecting Hefei and Anqing; 2) the
            improvement and rehabilitation of existing highways; 3) the
            implementation of a highway safety program; 4) institutional
            building program & training; 5) the imposition of
            front-end fees through tolls on users of the Hefei-Anqing
            Expressway; and 6) land acquisition and resettlement
            program. The Anhui Provincial Communications Department
            (APCD) has the overall responsibility for project
            preparation and implementation. The Anhui Highway
            Administration Bureau (AHAB) is responsible for the
            implementation of the highway maintenance program as well as
            the highway safety program. The overall direction of the
            project at the central level will rest with the Ministry of
            Communications (MOC), assuming also a coordinating role and
            provide technical support.
